Package model.area

package model.area
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    model
     
  • Class
    Description
    ActionSpace
    This class represents the space that can receive one or more family member.
    Board
    This class represents the board with all the areas you can find in the physical board.
    BoardInitializer
    This class initializes the board components by taking decoding information stored in files
    Church
    This class represents the church component of the game
    CouncilPalace
    This class represents the council palace component of the game
    Floor
    This class represents the floors in the towers, the related action spaces have specific bonuses taken from file and here you can place the familiar
    HarvestArea
    The Class representing the HarvestArea component of the game.
    IndustrialArea
    this class represents both the harvest and the production area, its multipleActionSpace will be initialized by the inherited classes.
    Market
    This class represents the market area, this is made of four different single action spaces where you can place one familiar to get a specific resource bonus
    MultipleActionSpace
    This class is the generic multiple action space, the one that characterizes the council palace and the big production and harvest areas.
    Occupable
    The Interface Occupable exposes some methods to every object of the game that can be occupied by a Family Member
    ProductionArea
    The Class representing the production area of the game board.
    SingleActionSpace
    This class is the generic single action space that you can find in floors, markets and in small production and harvest area.
    Tower
    This class represents the four towers in the game: TERRITORY,CHARACTER,BUILDING,VENTURE.
